entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the morning then steady.
